amendment.description: To make available funds for certain border and transportation security programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 3597 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3597 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 51. Record Vote Number: 169.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3597.
Amendment SA 3597 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S8987-8996, S9002-9003; text: CR S8987-8988) To make available funds for certain border and transportation security programs.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3597 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 51. Record Vote Number: 169.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3597 proposed by Senator Byrd.
